summary: This document appears to be a brief email or note regarding a conversation with William Brown about a potential exhibit, referencing record-keeping requirements for applications and a protective order. It is part of the Epstein case document release.

persons.name: William Brown
persons.context: Subject of notes regarding a potential exhibit and record-keeping requirements for applications.

keyFacts: The document references a conversation with William Brown about a potential exhibit.
It mentions business record-keeping requirements, specifically keeping applications for seven years, with an initial application in 2004.
The document is subject to a protective order covering specific paragraphs (7, 8, 9, 10, 15, and 17).
A birth certificate or U.S. passport was required to verify birthdate for the application, and a photo was also part of the application.
